languages.text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} and +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + wearer`s {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +<u>((AGI bonus + psy rating) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
On the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +<u>(5 × swiftshroud stacks)</u>% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +<u>((AGI bonus + psy rating) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +<u>(5 × swiftshroud stacks)</u>% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

languages.text:
每当装备者承受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，都会获得1层“迅捷身法”效果，且对抗此次借机攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%。
此外，装备者每当受到借机攻击时，都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}。
回合结束时，装备者失去所有“迅捷身法”层数，所有盟友闪避提高{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%，效果持续至装备者下回合为止。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者承受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时，都会获得1层“迅捷身法”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，且对抗此次借机攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高<u>（2×（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}））</u>%。
此外，装备者每当受到借机攻击时，都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于<u>（（敏捷加值+灵能等级）/2）</u>。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，装备者失去所有“迅捷身法”层数，所有盟友闪避提高<u>（5×失去的“迅捷身法”层数）</u>%，效果持续至装备者下回合为止。

每当装备者承受{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，都会获得1层“迅捷身法”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，且对抗此次借机攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%。
此外，装备者每当受到借机攻击时，都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，装备者失去所有“迅捷身法”层数，所有盟友闪避提高{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%，效果持续至装备者下回合为止。

languages.text:
Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "стремительная защита" и +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от этой атаки.
Также, становясь целью атаки по возможности, персонаж получает +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
В конце хода персонажа его уровни "стремительной защиты" снимаются, а все его союзники получают +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% к уклонению до следующего хода персонажа.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "стремительная защита" и +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа))</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от этой атаки.
Также, становясь целью атаки по возможности, персонаж получает +<u>((бонус ЛВК + пси-рейтинг) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
В конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа его уровни "стремительной защиты" снимаются, а все его союзники получают +<u>(5 × число уровней "стремительной защиты")</u>% к уклонению до следующего хода персонажа.

Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "стремительная защита" и +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа))</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от этой атаки.
Также, становясь целью атаки по возможности, персонаж получает +<u>((бонус ЛВК + пси-рейтинг) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
В конце {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа его уровни "стремительной защиты" снимаются, а все его союзники получают +<u>(5 × число уровней "стремительной защиты")</u>% к уклонению до следующего хода персонажа.

Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "стремительная защита" и +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от этой атаки.
Также, становясь целью атаки по возможности, персонаж получает +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
В конце хода персонажа его уровни "стремительной защиты" снимаются, а все его союзники получают +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% к уклонению до следующего хода персонажа.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}のターゲットとなるたびに、1スタック分のスイフトシュラウド効果と、この攻撃に対して{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を獲得する。
さらに、使用者は機会攻撃のターゲットとなるたびに、+{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}獲得する。
ターン終了時、使用者の次のターンまで、使用者はスイフトシュラウドのスタックすべてを消費し、味方すべてに回避を+{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%付与する。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}のターゲットとなるたびに、1スタック分のスイフトシュラウド{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}と、この攻撃に対して<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}))</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を獲得する。
さらに、使用者は機会攻撃のターゲットとなるたびに、<u>((AGIボーナス + 超能力レート) / 2)</u>{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者の次のターンまで、使用者はスイフトシュラウドのスタックすべてを消費し、味方すべてに<u>(5 × スイフトシュラウドのスタック)</u>%の回避を付与する。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}のターゲットとなるたびに、1スタック分のスイフトシュラウド{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}と、この攻撃に対して{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}％の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を獲得する。
さらに、使用者は機会攻撃のターゲットとなるたびに、{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者の次のターンまで、使用者はスイフトシュラウドのスタックすべてを消費し、味方すべてに{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}%の回避を付与する。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador es el objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, consigue +1 acumulación del efecto mortaja veloz y {uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra este ataque.
Además, el portador obtiene +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} cada vez que es el objetivo de un ataque de oportunidad.
Al finalizar su turno, el portador gasta todas sus acumulaciones de mortaja veloz para otorgar +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % de esquiva a todos los aliados hasta el próximo turno del portador.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador es el objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, consigue +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} mortaja veloz y <u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador))</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} contra este ataque.
Además, el portador obtiene +<u>((bonificación por AGI + factor psíquico) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} cada vez que es el objetivo de un ataque de oportunidad.
Al finalizar su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador gasta todas sus acumulaciones de mortaja veloz para otorgar +<u>(5 × acumulaciones de mortaja veloz)</u> % de esquiva a todos los aliados hasta el próximo turno del portador.

Cada vez que el portador es el objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, consigue +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} mortaja veloz y {uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra este ataque.
Además, el portador obtiene +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} cada vez que es el objetivo de un ataque de oportunidad.
Al finalizar su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador gasta todas sus acumulaciones de mortaja veloz para otorgar +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % de esquiva a todos los aliados hasta el próximo turno del portador.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffes{/g} wird, erhält er +1 Stapel des Schnellschleier-Effekts und +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} auf diesen Angriff.
Außerdem erhält der Träger +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, wenn er Ziel eines Gelegenheitsangriffs wird.
Am Ende seines Zuges verbraucht der Träger alle seine Schnellschleier-Stapel, um allen Verbündeten bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % Ausweichen zu gewähren.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffes{/g} wird, erhält er +1 Stapel des Schnellschleier-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} und +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Trägers))</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} auf diesen Angriff.
Außerdem erhält der Träger +<u>((BEW-Bonus+ Psi-Wert) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, jedes mal wenn er Ziel eines Gelegenheitsangriffs wird.
Am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} verbraucht der Träger alle seine Schnellschleier-Stapel, um all seinen Verbündeten +<u>(5 × Schnellschleier-Stapel)</u> % Ausweichen bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers zu gewähren.

Immer wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffes{/g} wird, erhält er +1 Stapel des Schnellschleier-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} und +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} auf diesen Angriff.
Außerdem erhält der Träger +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, jedes mal wenn er Ziel eines Gelegenheitsangriffs wird.
Am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} verbraucht der Träger alle seine Schnellschleier-Stapel, um all seinen Verbündeten +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % Ausweichen bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers zu gewähren.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il obtient +1 cumul de l'effet Agilolinceul et +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pour contrer cette attaque.
De plus, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} chaque fois qu'il est la cible d'une attaque d'opportunité.
À la fin de son tour, l'utilisateur dépense tous ses cumuls de l'effet Agilolinceul pour conférer à l'ensemble de ses alliés +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % d'esquive jusqu'à son tour suivant.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il reçoit +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Agilolinceul et +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur))</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} pour contrer cette attaque.
De plus, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +<u>((bonus d'AGI + indice psy) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} chaque fois qu'il est la cible d'une attaque d'opportunité.
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur dépense tous ses cumuls de l'effet Agilolinceul pour conférer à l'ensemble de ses alliés +<u>(5 × cumuls de l'effet Agilolinceul)</u> % d'esquive jusqu'à son tour suivant.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il reçoit +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Agilolinceul et +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur))</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} pour contrer cette attaque.
De plus, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +<u>((bonus d'AGI + indice psy) / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} chaque fois qu'il est la cible d'une attaque d'opportunité.
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur dépense tous ses cumuls de l'effet Agilolinceul pour conférer à l'ensemble de ses alliés +<u>(5 × cumuls de l'effet Agilolinceul)</u> % d'esquive jusqu'à son tour suivant.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il reçoit +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} Agilolinceul et +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pour contrer cette attaque.
De plus, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} chaque fois qu'il est la cible d'une attaque d'opportunité.
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur dépense tous ses cumuls de l'effet Agilolinceul pour conférer à l'ensemble de ses alliés +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} % d'esquive jusqu'à son tour suivant.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısının{/g} hedefi olduğunda +1 tezperde etkisi birikimi elde eder ve o saldırıya karşı +%{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} kazanır.
Takan kişi, ayrıca fırsat saldırılarıyla her hedeflendiğinde +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.
Takan kişi, turunun sonunda tüm tezperde birikimlerini harcayarak tüm dost birimlerine +%{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} kaçınma kazandırır. Bu etki, takan kişinin bir sonraki turuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.
